needs: Martha seeks to optimize HR operations by clarifying outcomes and constraints early to reduce ambiguity, improve efficiency, and enhance stakeholder alignment through measurable milestones. She aims to maintain simplicity in processes, minimize time-to-hire and disputes, and implement data-driven iteration while balancing governance and budget controls within a part-time role.
personality: Martha is collaborative and facilitative, valuing inclusivity, evidence, and craft. She communicates clearly through concise documentation and transparent trade-offs, surfacing unknowns early via experiments rather than assumptions. Her approach prioritizes humane, readable processes with accountability, favoring small incremental improvements to sustain momentum and align cross-functional teams effectively.
